member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.Options.DiagramOptionsBehavior.GlueToConnectionPointDistance

summary.para: Gets or sets the minimum distance between a connector's point being dragged and a shape's connection point at which the "glue" feature is activated. If the connector's point is dropped at this position or nearer, the connector will be glued to the highlighted connection point on the shape.

member.value: The minimum distance at which the "glue-to-connection-point" feature is activated.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.Options.DiagramOptionsBehavior.GlueToItemDistance

summary.para: Gets or sets the minimum distance between a connector's point being dragged and a shape at which the "glue-to-item" feature is activated. If the connector's point is dropped at this position or nearer, the connector will be glued to the shape.

member.value: The minimum distance at which the "glue-to-item" feature is activated.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.Options.DiagramOptionsBehavior.MinDragDistance

summary.para: Gets or sets the threshold, in pixels, for a shape drag-and-drop operation to start.

member.value: The threshold, in pixels, for a shape drag-and-drop operation to start.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.Options.DiagramOptionsBehavior.ResizingMode

summary.para: Gets or sets how diagram items are resized.

member.value: A value that specifies how diagram items are resized.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.Options.DiagramOptionsBehavior.SkinGallery

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the visibility and enabled state of the skin gallery in the Ribbon menu.

member.value: A value that specifies the visibility and enabled state of the skin gallery in the Ribbon menu.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.Options.DiagramOptionsBehavior.SnapToGrid

summary.para: Gets or sets whether a diagram item can snap to grid lines during item movement and resizing operations in the Diagram Designer.

member.value: true, if a diagram item can snap to grid lines; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.Options.DiagramOptionsBehavior.SnapToItems

summary.para: Gets or sets whether a diagram item can snap to alignment guides (snap lines) of other items during item movement and resizing operations in the Diagram Designer.

member.value: true, if the snapping feature is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.Options.DiagramOptionsBehavior.SnapToItemsDistance

summary.para: Gets or sets the minimum distance between alignment guides of a shape being dragged and another shape's alignment guides at which the "snap-to-items" feature is activated. If the dragged shape is dropped at this position, it will be aligned with the second shape.

member.value: The minimum distance between alignment guides of two shapes at which the "snap-to-items" feature is activated during shape drag-and-drop.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.Options.DiagramOptionsBehavior.UseTabNavigation

summary.para: Gets or sets whether navigation through diagram items using the TAB key is enabled.

member.value: Default or True, if TAB navigation through items is enabled; otherwise, False.

summary.para: A collection of objects.

member.param: The collection's owner.

member.param: An item to be added to the collection.

summary.para: Adds an array of items to the collection.

member.param: A comma-separated list of items or an array of items.

summary.para: Locks the DiagramItemCollection by preventing change notifications from being fired, preventing visual updates until the EndUpdate method is called.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.DiagramItemCollection.Contains(DevExpress.XtraDiagram.DiagramItem)

summary.para: Returns whether the specified item belongs to the current collection.

member.param: The item to locate in the collection.
member.returns: true if the specified item belongs to the collection; otherwise false.

summary.para: Unlocks the DiagramItemCollection object after a call to the BeginUpdate method and causes an immediate visual update.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.DiagramItemCollection.IndexOf(DevExpress.XtraDiagram.DiagramItem)

summary.para: Returns the zero-based index of the specified item in the collection.

member.param: The item whose index in the collection needs to be returned.
member.returns: A zero-based index of the required item.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.DiagramItemCollection.Insert(System.Int32,DevExpress.XtraDiagram.DiagramItem)

summary.para: Inserts a new element at the specified position.

member.param: The zero-based index specifying the position at which the item should be inserted.
The item to insert.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.DiagramItemCollection.Item(System.Int32)

summary.para: Provides indexed access to the items in the collection.

member.param: An integer value that specifies the index of the item to be returned from the collection.
member.value: An object stored at the specified index in the collection.

summary.para: Fires when the collection changes.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraDiagram.DiagramItemCollection.Remove(DevExpress.XtraDiagram.DiagramItem)

summary.para: Removes the specified object from the collection.

member.param: The item to be removed from the collection.
member.returns: true if the item is successfully removed from the collection; false if the specified item does not belong to the current collection.
